events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving their vehicle and another on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and vehicle damage.
An agent with experience in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to handle this case for further processing.
Customer has been notified that the claim has been successfully received and is being processed.
Request sent to customer asking for a copy of the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license.
Customer provided police report, vehicle damage images, and valid driver’s license as requested promptly.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted documents and accident details to assess liability.
Investigation concluded confirming that the insured party is not at fault in the collision based on evidence.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering the repair costs and rental vehicle expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim and the proposed settlement offer.
The proposed settlement was approved by the customer and internal review, enabling payment authorization.
Payment has been issued to the customer's account for the approved amount to cover vehicle repair.
The claim is now closed following the successful payment and resolution of the vehicle collision case.
